tickets.title: Update hero section to display 'HELLO WORLD'
tickets.description:
Modify the home page hero section to replace the main heading with 'HELLO WORLD' while maintaining existing visual styling and animations.

Changes:
- Replace the h1 heading text from 'Your Tech Partner as a Service' to 'HELLO WORLD'
- Keep the AuroraText component with the same gradient effect (colors: ['#10B981', '#22c55e', '#34D399', '#059669'])
- Maintain the existing badge, description paragraph, and CTA button
- Keep all motion animations and styling intact
- Ensure responsive design continues to work across all breakpoints (sm, md, lg)

File to modify:
- src/app/(logged-out)/home/components/hero-section.tsx

Acceptance Criteria:
- Hero section displays 'HELLO WORLD' as the main heading
- AuroraText gradient effect is applied to 'HELLO WORLD'
- Badge, description, and CTA button remain visible and functional
- All motion animations (fade-in, scale) continue to work
- Responsive design is maintained across all screen sizes
- No console errors or TypeScript errors
